CommandButtons.AddApps_ToolTip: Click here to add applications to your LiberKey
CommandButtons.Reinstall_ToolTip: Reinstalling an application can recreate the default shortcuts in the LiberKey menu, reload information on the application, and reapply the temporary file associations.
CommandButtons.Uninstall_ToolTip: Click here to uninstall this application from your LiberKey. Everything this application uses will be deleted: Menus, information, temporary file associations, the program itself and other associated data.

AutoRunMode.ShutDownSingle: On shutdow if not already running
AutoRunMode.StartupSingle: On startup if not already running

CommandButtons.AppUninstall_Caption: Click here to uninstall this application from your LiberKey
CommandButtons.AppUninstall_ToolTip: Click here to uninstall this application from your LiberKey. Everything concerning this application will be deleted: Menus, information, temporary file associations, the program itself and other associated data.

Labels.AppPathLabel_Caption: Executable path / folder / web page / document:

Messages.SetLicenseAddr: Enter internet adress of the program's license:
Messages.SetWebSiteAddr: Enter the Internet address of the program's editor:

CheckBoxs.AppHotKeysMemoPopup_Caption: Display a reminder before launching an application
CheckBoxs.AutoCloseApps_Caption: When menu closes, close any running portable applications
CheckBoxs.AutoCollapseOnHide_Caption: When the menu is hidden, go back to the root category
CheckBoxs.AutoHideMenuOnAppRun_Caption: Hide the menu when an application is started
CheckBoxs.AutoRemoveDrive_Caption: When the menu closes, disconnect the removable device
CheckBoxs.AutoRunLiberKey_Caption: Start LiberKey at Windows startup / logon
CheckBoxs.CreateTempSendToShortcut_Caption: Create "Send to / My portable documents" temporary shortcut
CheckBoxs.DontShowEmptyDesc_Caption: Except when the description is empty
CheckBoxs.EnableAppHotKeys_Caption: Enable keyboard shortcuts to launch applications
CheckBoxs.SingleClicAppRun_Caption: Run applications with a single click
CheckBoxs.SingleClicCategoryExpand_Caption: Open categories with a single click
CheckBoxs.ToolsQuitKFA_Caption: Disable file associations when the menu closes
CheckBoxs.ToolsQuitPDS_Caption: Remove portable shortcuts when the menu closes
CheckBoxs.ToolsStartKFA_Caption: Enable file associations when the menu starts
CheckBoxs.ToolsStartPDS_Caption: Add portable shortcuts when the menu starts
CheckBoxs.UseClearTypeFonts_Caption: Use ClearType for screen fonts display
CheckBoxs.UseProxy_Caption: Use a proxy server to access the Internet:
CheckBoxs.VoiceOver_Caption: Enable the reading of the text of elements hover the mouse
CheckBoxs.ZoomMenuFont_Caption: Change the font of floating menus

CommandButtons.AutoRunLocate_ToolTip: Find this shortcut in the LiberKey menu
CommandButtons.CopyTechnicalInfo_Caption: Copy this information to the clipboard
CommandButtons.CreateAccount_Caption: Click here to create your free account !

Labels.AppUpdateInfo_Caption: Configure the software update system of your LiberKey.
Labels.AutorunInfo_Caption: Manage the applications that execute at startup and shutdown of the LiberKey menu
Labels.ColorsInfo_Caption: Primary color of the menu and windows
Labels.FileAssocUpdatesOnlyInfo_Caption: During updates, file associations are not modified. They are defined only for new applications.
Labels.KeyboardShortcutsInfo_Caption: Keyboard shortcuts used by the LiberKey menu
Labels.LanguagesInfo_Caption: Select the language of the user interface
Labels.MaxRecentCount_Caption: Maximum number of items in recent launches:
Labels.MaxVisibleMostUsed_Caption: Maximum number of items in "most used":
Labels.NeverUpdateFileAssocInfo_Caption: File associations remain unchanged when applications are added or updated.
Labels.PlatformVersionInfo_Caption: The technical support team on the LiberKey forum may ask for this information. To copy this list, click the "Copy this information" button below.
Labels.ProxyInfo_Caption: If you need to go through a proxy server to access the internet, complete the below fields:
Labels.QuitOptions_Caption: Automatic app closure and USB drive disconnection
Labels.StartupWindowShowPrevious_Caption: Only show the menu if it was visible on last use
Labels.UpdateAllAppsInfo_Caption: The optional and priority updates are all installed without user input (automatic mode).
Labels.UpdateAutoStartInfo_Caption: Priority updates are installed without user input (automatic mode).
Labels.UpdateFileAssocInfo_Caption: When an application is added or updated with the installer, it is automatically associated with files it can edit.
Labels.UpdateNoUserAlertInfo_Caption: When LiberKey starts, don't show me any messages about application updates. You will be notified when you start an application that an update is available.
Labels.UpdateUIAlertInfo_Caption: You can then view the list of available updates and choose the ones you want to apply.
Labels.UserLoginInfo_Caption: Logging in is no longer required in order to download updates for your applications. Nevertheless, we still recommend entering your user details.

OptionButtons.optUpdateNoUserAlert_Caption: Warn me only when the application starts
OptionButtons.optUpdateUIAlert_Caption: Display an icon and a notification message
OptionButtons.optUpdateUserAlert_Caption: Warn me if priority updates are available

LiberKeyTools.AddAppsTip: This wizard will allow you to connect to the LiberKey servers and find the application you are looking for, and install it to your LiberKey.
LiberKeyTools.AppsCloseTip: The LiberKey Apps Closer automatically closes all of your applications launched from your LiberKey. The methods used to close the applications are numerous and adapted to each software. The closure is done properly, if a file was being edited (eg a document), you will be prompted to save it.
LiberKeyTools.ConfigurationTip: LiberKey configuration.\nAll the settings related to the appearance and behavior of your LiberKey are in this configuration window.
LiberKeyTools.DisableFileAssocTip: The files on the computer are currently associated to your LiberKey apps.\nClick this to restore the local computer's file associations.
LiberKeyTools.EnableFileAssocTip: Enable temporary file assocations (.avi, .jpg, .doc, ...) for the applications of your LiberKey.
LiberKeyTools.GoToWebSiteTip: This menu allows you to access the LiberKey website. You'll find all sorts of information on LiberKey and the forum open to all users.
LiberKeyTools.InstallAppSuiteTip: This wizard lets you install a full suite of applications.
LiberKeyTools.LiberKeyNewsTip: LiberKey News keeps you informed of any developments related to LiberKey.\nNew applications in the online catalog or any information regarding the LiberKey will be reported in the News.
LiberKeyTools.ManageAppsTip: Uninstall, install or reinstall applications. This set of tools will help you manage the applications installed on your LiberKey.
LiberKeyTools.PortableShortcutsTip: Portable Desktop Shortcut allows you to manage your portable desktop shortcuts related to your LiberKey.\nYou can also save the locations of the shortcuts on your desktop.
LiberKeyTools.Title: LiberKey Tools
LiberKeyTools.UpdateCheckTip: Check if a new version of the LiberKey or software updates are available.\nIf so, it is possible to perform these updates directly via LiberKey.com.
LiberKeyTools.USBEjectTip: LiberKey USB Eject allows you to disconnect the USB device containing your LiberKey (with automatic closing of all applications).\n\nREMINDER: Your USB device will only be able to eject when all applications from your LiberKey are closed.

Messages.BrowseForNewFolder: Select the folder that the shortcut will open

CheckBoxs.NotInSystrayMenu_Caption: Do not display in the main floating menu

Menus.InstallLKS_Tip: Select one or more LKS files (LiberKey Setup) to install in one click.
Menus.InstallsFromAppsFolder_Tip: This wizard will automatically check the "Apps" directory on your LiberKey if new applications are present.\nFor example you can copy applications from another LiberKey and save them in your Apps folder, and this wizard will detect them.
Menus.InstallsFromMyApps_Tip: If you have added manually portable applications in the "MyApps" directory on your LiberKey, this wizard will attempt to detect and register them in the menu.
Menus.RepairApps_Tip: This wizard will automatically check in the "Apps" folder of your LiberKey if your applications are damaged.\nIf an app coming from the LiberKey catalog is damaged it will offer to reinstall.
Menus.SendToPortableDocsDescription: Copy selected files into the "MyDocuments" LiberKey folder
Menus.SynchronizeCatalog_Tip: This wizard will allow you to connect to the LiberKey servers and find the application you are looking for, and install it to your LiberKey.

Messages.AppInstallDone: The application '%appname%" has been installed in your LiberKey.
Messages.AppNotFound: This application is not installed in your LiberKey.
Messages.AppRegistered: The application is now registered in your LiberKey.\n\nYou can now create the shortcut.
Messages.AppRunningCantUninst: The application is currently running.\n\nYou cannot uninstall an application while it is running.
Messages.AppsInstallDone: %count% new applications have been installed in your LiberKey.
Messages.AutoImportMenu: You have not yet created a menu to launch your applications.\nWould you like to import the tree from the old menu ?
Messages.BrokenAppFoundReinstall: This application appears to be damaged:%appname%\n\nWould you reinstall it?
Messages.ConfirmDeleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete the category "%name%" and shortcuts it contains?
Messages.ConfirmDeleteSortcut: Are you sure you want to delete the shortcut "%name%"?
Messages.ConfirmInstallExtension: Do you want to install this extension on your LiberKey?\n\n%extname%
Messages.ConfirmInstallMyApps: Do you want to detect new applications in the "MyApps" folder?
Messages.ConfirmInstallNewApps: Do you want to detect new applications in the "Apps" folder?
Messages.ConfirmUninstallApp: Are you sure want to remove this application?\nThis action can not be undone.
Messages.DropLKSLoadingInfos: Please wait while application information is retrieved ...
Messages.DropLKSToInstall: Release the mouse button to install the application in your LiberKey.

Errors.AccessRightsError: LiberKey requires write access to the portable device it is contained on.
Errors.CantCreateTempFolder: Unable to create the temporary folder.
Errors.CantDefineHotKey: An error occurred while setting the shortcut's hotkey "%name%":\n%err%
Errors.CantDefineHotKeys: An error occurred while setting the hotkeys for the following shortcuts:\n%err%\n%namelist%
Errors.CantStartOnRemoteDrive: You cannot use LiberKey on a network drive.
Errors.ExeBadFormat: Invalid EXE file or error in EXE image.
Errors.GetUpdateInfoError: An error occurred while attempting to retrieve update information:\nError %err%: %desc%
Errors.HotKeyAlreadyUsedBy: You already use this combination for the shortcut "%name%"!
Errors.InstallExtensionError: An error occurred during installation of this extension!\n\n%extname%
Errors.LKInstNotFound: The LiberKey Installer was not found!
Errors.LksDownloadFailed: An error occurred while downloading the installation package of %app% (%lks%).\n\nError %errnum%: %errdesc%
Errors.LogUploadFailed: An error occurred while sending information.
Errors.NewsFeedDownloadError: An error occurred while downloading the news data.\n%err%

IconSelection.IconSelectTitle: Select the file containing the icon

Messages.ImportMenuFormatError: This file contains no LiberKey menu.
Messages.LastAppShortcutUninstall: There's no more shortcuts to this app in your LiberKey menu.\nDo you want to uninstall it from your LiberKey?
Messages.LogUploadDone: The information has been sent.\nThank you for your participation in the development of LiberKey!
Messages.MenuExportTitle: Export menu in a XML file ...
Messages.MenuImportError: An error occurred while copying the menu into your LiberKey.
Messages.MenuImportNotFromProfile: You cannot import a menu that is already in your LiberKey.
Messages.MenuImportTitle: Import a menu from a XML file
Messages.NoAppAssocFound: No application of LiberKey is associated with this type of file
Messages.NoLogToSend: This tool allows you to send the event log of the menu to the LiberKey team to analyze problems.\n\nNo event log has been found.
Messages.NoNewAppInstalled: No new application found in the "Apps" directory of your LiberKey
Messages.NoNewMyAppInstalled: No new application found in the "MyApps" directory of your LiberKey
Messages.PatchAvailable: An update is available for your LiberKey.\n\nDo you want to download it now?
Messages.SendLogInfo:
This tool allows you to send the event log of the menu to the LiberKey team to analyze problems.

The technical information and the last 10 generated files in the "log" directory of your menu will be sent to the LiberKey team.

Are you sure you wish to proceed?
Messages.SetupAutoRestart: Setup of %app% will restart preconfigured for LiberKey.

TrayIcon.AppUpdatesAvailable: Updates are available for your applications.\nClick here to install.
TrayIcon.LiberKeyAssocFailed: An error occurred while attempting to activate the LiberKey protocol.\nSome features such as installation from the online catalog are disabled.
TrayIcon.LiberKeyUpdateAvailable: An update is available for your LiberKey.\nClick here to install.
TrayIcon.NewAppDetected: One or more new applications have been detected in the "MyApps" directory on your LiberKey.\nClick here to register new applications in your menu.

Messages.UpdatePlatformFirst: You must first update your LiberKey!\nWould you like to do this update now?

Messages.SelectExecutable: Select the program you want to add in the menu.

Messages.NoNewsDescription: There is no news at the moment.\nIf news is published, you will be notified by the "LiberKey News" icon that will appear above the "LiberKey Tools" button.
Messages.NoNewsUpdateDescription: There are currently %readcount% hidden (already read) news.\nTo see the hidden news, uncheck "Hide already read news" below.

CommandButtons.NoSyncCatalog_Caption: Access the online catalog without syncing my LiberKey

Labels.AccessURL_Caption: Address for accessing the online catalog synchronized with your LiberKey:
Labels.Privacy_Caption: Note: The version numbers sent to the website only cover applications available in the online catalog. No information about your personal applications is transmitted during this operation.

CheckBoxs.ApplyFilesAssocs_Caption: Associate the application to files it can open
CheckBoxs.CreateDefaultShortcuts_Caption: Create shortcuts to launch the application

CommandButtons.CancelSetup_Caption: Do not install the application into the "MyApps" folder
CommandButtons.OpenAppsFolder_Caption: Open the "Apps" folder of my LiberKey
CommandButtons.OpenMyAppsFolder_Caption: Open the "MyApps" folder of my LiberKey

Labels.AppInfoDetailsTitle_Caption: This application was originally installed from an LKS package (LiberKey Setup).\nThe following actions will be performed:
Labels.AppRegisterInfo_Caption: This application will be registered again in your LiberKey.
Labels.IntroText_Caption: This wizard is here to help you add applications to your LiberKey.
Labels.LbkAppFolderInfo_Caption: This application will not update automatically.\nYou should move the application into the "Apps" directory and repeat the operation.
Labels.LbkAppFolderMistake_Caption: Portable applications from the online catalog must be placed in the "Apps" folder.
Labels.lblLbkAppInfoMissing_Caption: Information about this application has not been found.\nUnable to save the information into your LiberKey.
Labels.lblLbkAppInfoMissingMoveApp_Caption: You should reinstall the app from the online catalog.\nFor use in the state, first move the app into the "MyApps" folder.
Labels.lblLbkAppInfoMissingUpdate_Caption: To properly register the application in your LiberKey, perform the update. For use in this state, first move the app into the "MyApps" folder.
Labels.lblUserAppFolderInfo: To save this application in your LiberKey, you should move it into the folder "MyApps" and repeat the action.
Labels.lblUserAppFolderMistake_Caption: Portable applications not from the online catalog must be placed in the directory "MyApps".
Labels.NewAppRegisterInfo_Caption: This application isn't registred to your LiberKey
Labels.PafInfoDetailsTitle_Caption: This application was originally installed from a PAF package (portableapps.com™).\nThe following operations will be performed:
Labels.UserAppInfoDetailsTitle_Caption: Portable applications must be registered in the LiberKey menu. You can then create shortcuts in the menu to run.\nThe following actions will be performed:
Labels.XSoftInfoDetailsTitle_Caption: This application was originally installed from a X-Software package (winpenpack.com™).\nThe following operations will be performed:

CheckBoxs.ShortcutNoMostUsed_Caption: Do not add to most used applications menu
CheckBoxs.ShortcutNoRecent_Caption: Do not add to recently used applications menu

CommandButtons.ShortcutAppEdit_Caption: This shortcut points to a portable application

CommandButtons.GetSuites_Caption: Download the list of available suites
CommandButtons.InstallSuite_Caption: Install all applications in the selected suite

Labels.DownloadInfo_Caption: This wizard lets you install a full suite of applications.\n\nClick on "Download the list of available suites" to continue.

Messages.ConfirmKeepDownloads: Would you like to keep the application packages for later installation?
Messages.GetSuiteInfoFailed: An error occurred while retrieving the list of suites available.\n\nError %errnum%: %errdesc%
Messages.IncompleteSuiteSetup: Some applications of the selected suite were not installed correctly.\nYou can restart this wizard later to complete the installation.
Messages.PartialSuiteSetupDone: The selected applications have been installed.\nYou can restart this wizard later to add more applications.
Messages.SetupDone: The applications of suite "%name%" are now installed on your LiberKey.

CheckBoxs.RemoveAppFolder_Caption: Remove application folder (including the program and associated data)
CheckBoxs.RemoveAppShortcuts_Caption: Remove any shortcuts pointing to this application
CheckBoxs.RemoveFilesAssocs_Caption: Remove the file associations used by this program

Labels.IntroText_Caption: This wizard will help you uninstall applications from your LiberKey.
Labels.PreviewInfo_Caption: Here is the list of actions that your LiberKey will perform upon uninstallation. In some cases the removal of an application can lead to other losses. Be sure to check this list before uninstalling.
Labels.RemoveAppInfo_Caption: This application will be removing from your LiberKey
Labels.RemoveInfoDetailsTitle_Caption: The following actions will be performed while uninstalling the program. Uncheck options if you want to keep certain information concerning application.

PreviewTree.KFANotFound: Files associations configuration file not found.
PreviewTree.KFANotUsed: No temporary association for this application
PreviewTree.KfaUsedForTypeIcon: Used for this icon type file

Labels.AppsUpdateFound: Updates are available for your applications.
Labels.AppsUpdateNotFound: No update is available for your applications.
Labels.NewAppsFound: Additional applications are available for your LiberKey in the online catalog.
Labels.NewAppsNotFound: No additional applications for your LiberKey was found in the online catalog

Labels.PlatformUpdateNotFound: No update found for the LiberKey Platform
